query:
-- 查看张三的完整信息
SELECT 
  u.id as userId, 
  u.username, 
  u.email,
  sp.id as permissionId,
  sp.stockUserId,
  su.name as stockUserName,
  su.initialBalance
FROM users u
LEFT JOIN stockUserPermissions sp ON u.id = sp.userId
LEFT JOIN stockUsers su ON sp.stockUserId = su.id
WHERE u.username = '张三';

-- 查看张三最近的session
SELECT sessionToken, userId, expiresAt, createdAt
FROM sessions
WHERE userId = (SELECT id FROM users WHERE username = '张三')
ORDER BY createdAt DESC
LIMIT 1;
